title: DiGiovine Hnilo Jordan + Johnson Financial Advisors Makes Top 100 Wealth Management Firms List
text:
We feel that our growth and success is a direct result of the trust that has been placed in us by our clients. --Paul Minta, Managing Principal Naperville, Ill (PRWEB) July 10, 2015
DiGiovine Hnilo Jordan + Johnson Financial Advisors is pleased to announce their inclusion on CNBC’s 2015 Top 100 Wealth Management Firms List coming in at number 97 amongst all fee-based wealth management firms in the nation.
“DHJJ Financial Advisors continues to grow because of the relationships that we have established with our loyal client base and the hard work exhibited by our growing team of dedicated professionals,” said Paul Minta, Managing Principal. “We feel that our growth and success is a direct result of the trust that has been placed in us by our clients.”
The CNBC Digital editorial team, along with Meridian-IQ, used a proprietary formula to arrive at the final ranking of wealth management firms. This formula took into account a variety of measures including the amount of assets under management, having staff with professional designations, average account size, growth of assets, years in business, and number of advisory clients, to name a few.
To view the entire list of 100 firms, please visit http://www.cnbc.com/id/102623562 .
About DiGiovine Hnilo Jordan + Johnson Financial Advisors Ltd.
DiGiovine Hnilo Jordan + Johnson Financial Advisors Ltd. is a Registered Investment Advisory Firm that has been providing asset management and financial planning services to its clients since 1988. For over 25 years, our team of dedicated investment advisors has worked closely with our clients to produce unique investment portfolios designed to meet their personalized needs. For more information, please visit http://www.dhjjfinancial.com .
